name: All is fair in capture the flag reupload
name_original: All is fair in capture the flag reupload
description:
Xbox Controls only.

Left stick to move

Right Bumper is a small AOE slam attack

X is to shoot a arrow that will freeze the opponents movement for a certain amount of time

A is to shoot a arrow that has a chance to kill the opponent 

B is to blink this is like a doge

Y is to recall straight back to base.

Disclaimer that everything but the usage of 3rd person character movement was made during jam.
